page.title: 04SECONDARY EDUCATION
page.content: The 11 to 14 year olds are bused to {Market Bosworth High School}5 miles away.Two buses pick up in Sheepy, one travels via Twycross and takes 25 minutes and the other via Sibson and takes 20 minutes.Pick up time is 8a.m. and they return in the village at 4.20p.m. 14 to 18 year olds attend{Bosworth} {College, Desford}a distance of 10 miles,and a journey time of 25 minutes.The bus leaves the village at 8a.m. and returns at 3.20p.m. After high school as an alternative children may attend John Cleveland College Hinckley which is 12 miles away.A small number of village children attend{Catholic}schools.For primary it is at Atherstone 3 miles away and for secondary it is at St Thomas Moore School Nuneaton about 8 miles away.
